body:
Summary
new spack installation on Ubtunu 18.04. Commands like spack list, spack arch does work without problems. 
As soon as I install any package it troughs just "==> Error:" without more information. I have no idea whats wrong or where I can look for the detailed error. I didn't find any log files or build directories.  Where can I find a more detailed failure description? 
 
### Expected Result

install some package

### Actual Result

==> Error:

### Steps to reproduce the issue

spack install <anything>

### Information on your system

Cluster with some Centos 7 nodes and some new nodes (with GPUs) with ubuntu 18.04 installed. they work with slurm for scheduling. I have an installation of spack for CentOS this one works very well and another installation for our new  Ubuntu-based nodes.
title: spack install results always in ==>Error:
